name: TalkGuy
_source: speak;Sages;I can appreciate some good peace and quiet, myself.
speak;Guy;Look, I'm exhausted, I could hardly sleep after that battle.
speak;Sages;Whereas I slept for far too long...
speak;Guy;I wish I coulda swapped with you, then.
speak;Sages;Sorry for disturbing your dozing, Guy.
speak;Guy;Well, it's less earache than with my pals.
speak;Sages;I see, they are somewhat animated, yes.
speak;Guy;That's generous.|I love 'em to bits, but man, the noise...
speak;Guy;At least it's distracting me from the thoughts of Pykroes dead body...
speak;Guy;At least it's distracting me from the thoughts of my Hypers dead body...
speak;Guy;At least it's distracting me from the thoughts of my friends dead bodies...
speak;Sages;Alright, see ya, GuySir! Enjoy your nap!
